use_of_proceeds_paragraphs: ESTIMATED SOURCES AND USES OF FUNDS.

The  estimated  sources  and  uses  of  the  Series  2017  TaxExempt  Bonds  and  the  Series  2017  Taxable  Bonds  are  set  forth  below  (amounts  below  are  rounded  to  the  closest  whole  dollar  amount;  figures below may not sum due to rounding):  .

Sources:  Par Amount    plus net original issue premium  Corporation Contribution    Total    Uses:  Project Expenditures  Deposit to Escrow Funds  Underwriters’ Compensation/ Costs of  Issuance‡    Total.
Series 2017  Fixed Rate.

The Series 2017 Adjustable Rate Bonds and the Series 2017 Taxable Bonds are not offered by this Official Statement.
See  “PLAN OF FINANCE.”.

‡  Underwriters’  compensation  and  certain  costs  of  issuance,  including  certain  fees  and  expenses  of  various  legal  counsel,  accountants,  the  financial  advisor,  the  Issuer,  the  Bond  Trustee,  the  Master  Trustee,  the  Verification  Agent,  the  rating  agencies and costs of printing related to the issuance of the Series 2017 Bonds will be paid from the proceeds of the Series  2017 Taxable Bonds.
See “UNDERWRITING.”.
SECURITY FOR THE SERIES 2017 FIXED RATE BONDS.
General.

The Series 2017 Fixed Rate Bonds will constitute special limited obligations of the Issuer and  will be payable solely from the moneys received pursuant to the Sublease and secured under the Bond  Indenture by (i) the Series 2017 Fixed Rate Master Obligation issued to the Bond Trustee; (ii) a pledge of  the payments received and to be received under the Sublease; and (iii) the money and securities held by  the  Bond  Trustee  in  certain  of  the  funds  and  accounts  under  the  Bond  Indenture.
The  covenants  and  agreements in the Bond Indenture are for the equal and ratable benefit of all present and future owners of  the Series 2017 Fixed Rate Bonds..

THE SERIES 2017 FIXED RATE BONDS DO NOT CONSTITUTE INDEBTEDNESS OF  THE  STATE  OF  OHIO  OR  ANY  POLITICAL  SUBDIVISION,  AGENCY  OR  PUBLIC  INSTRUMENTALITY  THEREOF  OR  OF  THE  ISSUER,  WITHIN  THE  MEANING  OF  ANY  PROVISION OF THE CONSTITUTION OR LAWS OF THE STATE OF OHIO.

NEITHER THE  CREDIT NOR THE TAXING POWER OF ANY STATE OR ANY POLITICAL SUBDIVISION,  AGENCY  OR  PUBLIC  INSTRUMENTALITY  THEREOF  IS  PLEDGED  TO  THE  PAYMENT  OF THE PRINCIPAL OF, PREMIUM, IF ANY, OR INTEREST ON THE SERIES 2017 FIXED  RATE BONDS.. 7.
intro_page_paragraphs: The descriptions and summaries of various documents set forth in this Official Statement do not  purport  to  be  comprehensive  or  definitive,  and  reference  is  made  to  each  document  for  the  complete  details  of  all  terms  and  conditions.
All  statements  in  this  Official  Statement  regarding  any  such  documents are qualified in their entirety by reference to such documents.

This Introductory Statement is  intended only to serve as a brief description of certain information set forth in this Official Statement and  is  expressly  qualified  by  reference  to  the  Official  Statement  as  a  whole,  as  well  as  the  documents  summarized or described herein.
All references to this Official Statement include the cover page, inside  cover  page  and  appendices.

Each  capitalized  word  or  term  used  as  a  defined  term  in  this  Official  Statement, unless otherwise defined or the context otherwise requires, has the meaning assigned to it in  APPENDIX C.  For more detailed descriptions of the matters summarized below, see the information set  forth in the specific sections of this Official Statement to which cross references are made..
The Series 2017 Fixed Rate Bonds are being issued as multimodal bonds in a LongTerm Rate  mode,  fixed  to  their  respective  maturity.

This  Official  Statement  does  not  describe  terms  specifically  applicable to any Series 2017 Fixed Rate Bonds bearing interest at rates other than a fixed rate.. Purpose of this Official Statement.

This  Official  Statement,  including  the  cover  page,  inside  cover  page  and  appendices  attached  hereto, sets forth information in connection with the abovecaptioned Series of Bonds (the “Series 2017  Fixed Rate Bonds”) to be issued by the County of Allen, Ohio (the “Issuer”) for the benefit of Mercy  Health (formerly known as Catholic Health Partners, formerly known as Catholic Healthcare Partners), an  Ohio nonprofit corporation (the “Corporation”) and its Affiliates (as defined herein)..

The  Series  2017  Fixed  Rate  Bonds  are  being  issued  and  sold  by  the  Issuer  pursuant  to  a  “Participation  Agreement”  (as  defined  herein),  with  certain  Ohio  political  subdivisions,  under  the  authority of Chapter 140, Ohio Revised Code (the “Act”), and pursuant to an Indenture of Trust (Bond  Indenture), to be dated as of December 1, 2017 (the “Bond Indenture”), by and between the Issuer and  The Bank of New York Mellon Trust Company, N.A.

Pursuant  to  Supplemental  Master  Trust  Indenture  Number  ThirtyFour,  to  be  dated  as  of  December  1,  2017  (the  “Supplemental  Indenture”),  which  will  supplement  the  Master  Trust  Indenture  (Amended and Restated), dated as of October 15, 1996, as previously supplemented and amended (as so  supplemented and amended, the “Master Indenture”), by and between the Corporation and The Bank of  New York Mellon Trust Company, N.A.
(as successor trustee to J.P. Morgan Trust Company, National  Association, successor trustee to PNC Bank, Ohio, National Association), as master trustee (the “Master.
